summary: The Retirement Fairness for Charities and Educational Institutions Act of 2025 aims to enhance 403(b) retirement plans. It modifies existing federal securities laws (Investment Company Act of 1940, Securities Act of 1933, and Securities Exchange Act of 1934) to provide clarity and flexibility regarding which 403(b) plans are eligible for certain exemptions and regulations.  The bill includes provisions related to fiduciary responsibilities and investment oversight.
